reviews.sarah: I was struggling to get traction for my coaching business until I found Hupscale. Within three months, my client base tripled and my revenue doubled. Their strategies are simple but incredibly effective. If you want real results, not just promises, this is your team!
reviews.rachel: Hupscale transformed my content strategy completely! I went from posting randomly to having a clear plan that actually converts. My email list grew from 200 to 5,000 subscribers in just four months. The team really understands what it takes to scale a business!
reviews.marcus: As a small business owner, I thought growth was out of reach. Hupscale proved me wrong. They helped me streamline my processes and reach customers I never thought possible. My sales increased by 150% in six months. Absolutely worth every penny!
reviews.emma: I've worked with several agencies before, but Hupscale is different. They actually care about your success. My brand visibility skyrocketed, and I finally feel confident in my business direction. The results speak for themselves—my best investment this year!
reviews.paul: I have been in 1-to-1 coaching with Scalpa for 3 and a half years now. I have learned so much that has allowed me to scale my business and triple my revenue. I'm not planning to stop there! Very satisfied with the work done.

questions.guarantees: What kind of guarantees do I have?
questions.information: What information do I need to provide?

answers.whyChoose: At Hupscale, we feel that — it's chaos out there to grow on social. So, we are here to help. We are more than a marketing agency, we are your growth partners. Our tactics are designed to be scalable for new or advanced developers alike. We provide results, 1:1 support and great affection. Let's grow together.
answers.whyGrow: You might think it is very easy because you will get more followers, however this must be about growing a community that loves what do. Growth is important for anything you do, whether that be a small business or creator or sharing your message and connecting with new people. And being the center of attention in social will also unlock new opportunities for you and thus, collaboration with others. When you can flourish, why be small?
answers.guarantees: We believe in what we do and the results we achieve. We won't lie to you—no one can guarantee you'll become famous overnight, but we'll be with you every step of the way, tweaking strategies as needed to keep you on track for real progress. Our success is measured by your satisfied smile, so we won't stop until you're happy with the results.
answers.information: We only require the essential information that any agency might need, such as your target audience, your current audience, your goals, and how we can help you achieve them. Hupscale or any member of our staff will never ask for your username or password.

pascal.name: Scalpa Delorantis
pascal.bio: Visionary leader with 10+ years of experience in digital marketing and scaling ambitious brands. Pascal is passionate about building teams and delivering innovation to help clients grow through strategic thinking.

rodney.name: Rodney Onanga
rodney.bio: A tech wizard with 17 years of experience, Rodney specializes in programming, startups, AI, and new technology. He develops web apps, AI assistants, and digital products, actively driving innovation with curiosity and expertise.

frederic.name: Frédéric Cordat
frederic.bio: Fred is our Chief Digital Officer. He is brilliant and well travelled. He speaks fluently French, English and Japanese.

leandro.name: Leandro Schmidt
leandro.bio: Based in Argentina, Leandro manages our Latin American presence with professionalism, dedication, and strong client relationships. His experience spans diverse industries, building trusted partnerships across the region. Fluent in English, he bridges Latin America with global clients and projects.
